column3: Another anima glass? I could swear I saw you using the one I gave you not long ago.
If they were more easily crafted I would gladly offer you another, but sadly that is not the case. That said, you are more than welcome to a replacement when you are truly in need.
No need to fret. I have prepared another as a safety precaution. With so much at stake, one can never be too careful.
If anything should happen to it, pray come and speak with me. I shall see to having another prepared for you.
Are you certain? I imagine tracking the anima's progress will be difficult without it.
Well, let me know should you change your mind.
